articles.title: Why readers think Bill Belichick belonged in the Hall of Fame this year
articles.description:
is used to specify article abstract. You can only provide plain text in this element. --> After Belichick fell short of first-ballot induction into the Class of 2026, Boston.com readers largely called it a snub — though some eluded to Tom Brady and Patriots-era scandals as complicating factors.

The post Why readers think Bill Belichick belonged in the Hall of Fame this year appeared first on Boston.com.
